title.rendered: Lyra Artisan Fire Bowl featured in Hearth & Home

content.rendered: The August issue of Hearth and Home features the Lyra Artisan Fire Bowl in an article about the newest fire tables & pits on the market. The article states, “The Lyra Artisan Fire Bowl—part of the Artisan Fire Bowls collection— bridges rustic and polished designs to create a beautiful one-of-a-kind aesthetic. It has subtle variations in color (Black Sand, Oak Barrel, Aged Teak, Oyster Shell) and texture (honed, travertine) to create an appearance similar to limestone. It is equipped with high-performance brass burners.”
